casebody.data:
EVEREST INDEMNITY INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
TIM TIGER ENTERPRISES, LLC, d/b/a TTW Mehanical Corp., Defendant,
and
Travelers Property Casualty Company of America, as Subrogee of Borough of Cliffside Park, Nominal Defendant. M-1505 September Term 2016
078934 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification is denied.
